headline: IBM and the USTA Roll Out AI-Powered Fan Experiences for 2025 US Open
summary: IBM (NYSE: IBM) and the United States Tennis Association (USTA) today announced a new lineup of AI-powered digital experiences coming to USOpen.org and the US Open app for this year's tournament. Co-created by IBM and the USTA, the features are designed to deliver millions of tennis fans worldwide more of the customized, nonstop coverage they crave throughout the two-week Grand Slam.

headline: IBM Study: Sports Fans Demand More Dynamic Digital Content, Powered by AI
